title: Serviced Luxury Ocean Apartment in Mirissa
details:
The Loft Mirissa Apartments are an exclusive, resort-style, serviced condominium project developed for those interested in owning a timelessly designed, fast appreciating free hold property in the iconic coastal town of Mirissa. Apartments come fully furnished and equipped with a guaranteed rental income. What we offer is a luxurious holiday home of your own that generates an income for you while you’re away, completely cost and hassle free.

For more information visit www.loftmirissa.com

We have a limited number of one-bedroom deluxe suites (640 Sq. Ft.) and two-bedroom lofts (1000 Sq. Ft.) which offer an un-obstructed view of the ocean, Mirissa habour and the lush green surroundings.

This is a project by Provident Capital in collaboration with National Development Bank (NDB). Construction of the project is scheduled to begin by July 2018. Buildmart Lanka (Pvt) Ltd has been appointed as the contractor. Our legal partners are Sudath Perera Associates.

AVERAGE RENTAL INCOME OF 6% PER YEAR

All apartments are sold fully furnished inclusive of Linen, cutlery, crockery and electrical appliances.

Designer Italian or German pantry cupboards with comprehensive warranties

Units are sold with a 5 year management contract with Origins Hospitality & Leisure.

NO MONTHLY SERVICE FEES!

RESERVATIONS NOW OPEN!
